sql.Text: select count(a.DepartmentId) from Department as a @where

select top @pageSize * from (select row_number() over(order by @orderbyStr) as rownumber, a.DepartmentId, a.Name, a.Code, a.Description, a.Company from Department as a @where ) as temp_table where rownumber between @pageSize*(@currentPageNo-1)+1 and @pageSize*(@currentPageNo)
select a.DepartmentId as , a.Name as , a.Code as , a.Description as , a.Company as from Department as a @where
